name: TopicPolicy
shortDesc: The AWS::SNS::TopicPolicy resource associates Amazon SNS topics with a policy.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.desc: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS topics.

properties.name: Topics
properties.desc: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy. You can use the Ref function to specify an AWS::SNS::Topic resource.
properties.type: A list of Amazon SNS topics ARNs
